channel.title: Comments on: Apple Pie Moonshine
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: By: kiermaierstacey
item.dc:creator: kiermaierstacey
item.description: It smells like moonshine but the flavor really tastes like apple pie w only a hint of a liquor taste. It really gives this juice a nice kick but it's not overwhelming. I really enjoy this flavor!!
item.content:encoded: It smells like moonshine but the flavor really tastes like apple pie w only a hint of a liquor taste. It really gives this juice a nice kick but it’s not overwhelming. I really enjoy this flavor!!

item.title: By: ListlessSpectre
item.dc:creator: ListlessSpectre
item.description: Awesome flavor! Easily an ADV for anyone into apple flavorings and has a nice smooth sweet taste with a subtle liquor kick. Will definitely be back for more of this!
item.content:encoded: Awesome flavor! Easily an ADV for anyone into apple flavorings and has a nice smooth sweet taste with a subtle liquor kick. Will definitely be back for more of this!
